title: Introduction & Basics
description: Start the conversation by introducing yourself and giving the interviewer a clear summary of your background.

dictionary.meaning: The job or position you are working in right now
The tasks and duties you are expected to do in your job
Your education, experience, and previous roles
Something important or impressive you have accomplished
Programming tools, languages, or frameworks you use

phrases.phrase: I’m currently working as a [job title] at [company].

translation.uk: Зараз я працюю на посаді [назва посади] в компанії [назва компанії].

phrases.meaning: Used to describe your current role and employer

phrases.phrase: I have around [X] years of experience in [industry or field].

translation.uk: У мене близько [X] років досвіду у сфері [галузь].

phrases.meaning: Used to give a general summary of your experience
Used to highlight a professional focus or strength

phrases.phrase: I started my career in [field], but over time I moved into [new field/role].

translation.uk: Я починав кар'єру у [сфера], але з часом перейшов у [нова сфера/роль].

phrases.meaning: Used to describe a career transition

phrases.phrase: One of my proudest achievements was [brief description].

translation.uk: Одне з моїх найбільших досягнень — це [короткий опис].

phrases.meaning: Used to emphasize something you’re proud of

model_behavior.prompt: You are an HR interviewer starting a screening call. Begin with introductory questions. Let the user talk about their experience, education, and background. Be supportive and curious.

scenario.situation: You are having an introductory conversation with a candidate
scenario.goal: Help the user talk clearly and confidently about their experience and background
steps: Can you tell me about yourself?
optional_steps: What do you do in your current role?
How did you get into this field?
What kind of projects have you worked on recently?
What technologies are you most comfortable with?
What role do you usually take in a team?
What achievement are you most proud of?
What was your most recent job?
How would you describe your career path so far?

meta.model_end_behavior: Thank the user for sharing and proceed to the next stage.
